verses.text: \w And|strong="G1161"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, \w that|strong="G1722"\w*, while \w Apollos|strong="G0625"\w* \w was|strong="G1511"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Corinth|strong="G2882"\w*, \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* having passed \w through|strong="G1330"\w* the \w upper|strong="G0510"\w* \w coasts|strong="G3313"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w finding|strong="G2147"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*,

He \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Have|strong="G1487"\w* ye \w received|strong="G2983"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* since ye \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*? \w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, We \w have|strong="G0191"\w* not so much \w as|strong="G3761"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w whether|strong="G1487"\w* there \w be|strong="G2076"\w* any \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* were ye \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w*? \w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w John’s|strong="G2491"\w* \w baptism|strong="G0908"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w verily|strong="G3303"\w* \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* with the \w baptism|strong="G0908"\w* of \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* unto the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they should \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* him \w which|strong="G3588"\w* should \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G5124"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* they \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add this\add*, they were \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* had \w laid|strong="G2007"\w* \add his\add* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* upon \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G5037"\w* they \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* with \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w prophesied|strong="G4395"\w*.
\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w about|strong="G5616"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1177"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w went|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w*, and spake \w boldly|strong="G3955"\w* for the space \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w months|strong="G3376"\w*, \w disputing|strong="G1256"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w persuading|strong="G3982"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* \w divers|strong="G5100"\w* were \w hardened|strong="G4645"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* believed \w not|strong="G0544"\w*, but spake \w evil|strong="G2551"\w* of that \w way|strong="G3598"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w*, he \w departed|strong="G0868"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w separated|strong="G0873"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w disputing|strong="G1256"\w* \w daily|strong="G2250"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w school|strong="G4981"\w* of \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w Tyrannus|strong="G5181"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w continued|strong="G1096"\w* by the space \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*; so \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* which \w dwelt|strong="G2730"\w* in \w Asia|strong="G0773"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w both|strong="G5037"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Greeks|strong="G1672"\w*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w wrought|strong="G4160"\w* \w special|strong="G5177"\w* \w miracles|strong="G1411"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* of \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*:

So \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w body|strong="G5559"\w* were \w brought|strong="G2018"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* the \w sick|strong="G0770"\w* \w handkerchiefs|strong="G4676"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w aprons|strong="G4612"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w diseases|strong="G3554"\w* \w departed|strong="G0525"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* the \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w* went \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* the \w vagabond|strong="G4022"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w exorcists|strong="G1845"\w*, took upon \w them|strong="G2021"\w* to \w call|strong="G3687"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* which \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, We \w adjure|strong="G3726"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* by \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w preacheth|strong="G2784"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* there \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w sons|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G4630"\w* \add one\add* \w Sceva|strong="G4630"\w*, a \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w*, \add and\add* chief of the \w priests|strong="G0749"\w*, which \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w so|strong="G5124"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* I \w know|strong="G1097"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* I \w know|strong="G1987"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* the \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w leaped|strong="G2177"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w overcame|strong="G2634"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w prevailed|strong="G2480"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, so \w that|strong="G5620"\w* they \w fled|strong="G1628"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w* \w naked|strong="G1131"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wounded|strong="G5135"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w known|strong="G1110"\w* to \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Greeks|strong="G1672"\w* \w also|strong="G5037"\w* \w dwelling|strong="G2730"\w* at \w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* \w fell|strong="G1968"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* was \w magnified|strong="G3170"\w*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w confessed|strong="G1843"\w*, and \w shewed|strong="G0312"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w deeds|strong="G4234"\w*.

\w Many|strong="G2425"\w* of \w them|strong="G3588"\w* also which \w used|strong="G4238"\w* curious \w arts|strong="G4021"\w* brought \w their|strong="G4851"\w* \w books|strong="G0976"\w* \w together|strong="G4851"\w*, and burned \w them|strong="G2618"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w counted|strong="G4860"\w* the \w price|strong="G5092"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \add it\add* \w fifty|strong="G4002"\w* \w thousand|strong="G3461"\w* \add pieces\add* of \w silver|strong="G0694"\w*.
\w So|strong="G3779"\w* \w mightily|strong="G2904"\w* \w grew|strong="G0837"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w prevailed|strong="G2480"\w*.

¶ \w After|strong="G5613"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* were \w ended|strong="G4137"\w*, \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w purposed|strong="G5087"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, when he had passed \w through|strong="G1330"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Achaia|strong="G0882"\w*, to \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w saying|strong="G2036"\w*, \w After|strong="G3326"\w* \w I|strong="G3165"\w* have \w been|strong="G1096"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*, \w I|strong="G3165"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w Rome|strong="G4516"\w*.

\w So|strong="G1161"\w* he \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* of \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w ministered|strong="G1247"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Timotheus|strong="G5095"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Erastus|strong="G2037"\w*; but \w he|strong="G1907"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* \w stayed|strong="G1907"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Asia|strong="G0773"\w* for a \w season|strong="G5550"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w same|strong="G1565"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w* there \w arose|strong="G1096"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w small|strong="G3641"\w* \w stir|strong="G5017"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* that \w way|strong="G3598"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \add man\add* \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Demetrius|strong="G1216"\w*, a \w silversmith|strong="G0695"\w*, which \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w silver|strong="G0693"\w* \w shrines|strong="G3485"\w* for \w Diana|strong="G0735"\w*, \w brought|strong="G3930"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w small|strong="G3641"\w* \w gain|strong="G2039"\w* unto the \w craftsmen|strong="G5079"\w*;

\w Whom|strong="G3739"\w* he called \w together|strong="G4867"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* the \w workmen|strong="G2040"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* like \w occupation|strong="G5108"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Sirs|strong="G0435"\w*, ye \w know|strong="G1987"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w craft|strong="G2039"\w* we \w have|strong="G2076"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w wealth|strong="G2142"\w*.

\w Moreover|strong="G2532"\w* ye \w see|strong="G2334"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w alone|strong="G3440"\w* at \w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w almost|strong="G4975"\w* \w throughout|strong="G1223"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w Asia|strong="G0773"\w*, \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* hath \w persuaded|strong="G3982"\w* and turned \w away|strong="G3179"\w* \w much|strong="G2425"\w* \w people|strong="G3793"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* they \w be|strong="G1526"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w gods|strong="G2316"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* are \w made|strong="G1096"\w* with \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*:

So \w that|strong="G1161"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w our|strong="G2254"\w* \w craft|strong="G3313"\w* is in \w danger|strong="G2793"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* be \w set|strong="G2064"\w* at \w nought|strong="G0557"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* that \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w temple|strong="G2411"\w* of the \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w goddess|strong="G2299"\w* \w Diana|strong="G0735"\w* should \w be|strong="G3195"\w* \w despised|strong="G3049"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w magnificence|strong="G3168"\w* should be \w destroyed|strong="G2507"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* \w Asia|strong="G0773"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w world|strong="G3625"\w* \w worshippeth|strong="G4576"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when they \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add these sayings\add*, they \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w full|strong="G4134"\w* of \w wrath|strong="G2372"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* cried \w out|strong="G2896"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Great|strong="G3173"\w* \add is\add* \w Diana|strong="G0735"\w* of the \w Ephesians|strong="G2180"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w* was \w filled|strong="G4130"\w* with \w confusion|strong="G4799"\w*: \w and|strong="G5037"\w* having \w caught|strong="G4884"\w* \w Gaius|strong="G1050"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Aristarchus|strong="G0708"\w*, men of \w Macedonia|strong="G3110"\w*, \w Paul’s|strong="G3972"\w* companions in \w travel|strong="G4898"\w*, they \w rushed|strong="G3729"\w* with one \w accord|strong="G3661"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w theatre|strong="G2302"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w would|strong="G1014"\w* have entered \w in|strong="G1525"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w people|strong="G1218"\w*, the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w suffered|strong="G1439"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* of the chief of \w Asia|strong="G0775"\w*, which \w were|strong="G5607"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w friends|strong="G5384"\w*, \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w desiring|strong="G3870"\w* \add him\add* that he \w would|strong="G1325"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* adventure \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w theatre|strong="G2302"\w*.

\w Some|strong="G0243"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* cried one \w thing|strong="G2896"\w*, \w and|strong="G3303"\w* \w some|strong="G0243"\w* \w another|strong="G5100"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w assembly|strong="G1577"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w confused|strong="G4797"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the more \w part|strong="G4119"\w* \w knew|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w wherefore|strong="G1752"\w* they were come \w together|strong="G4905"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w drew|strong="G4264"\w* \w Alexander|strong="G0223"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w*, the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w putting|strong="G4261"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w forward|strong="G4261"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Alexander|strong="G0223"\w* \w beckoned|strong="G2678"\w* with the \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, and would \w have|strong="G2309"\w* made his \w defence|strong="G0626"\w* unto the \w people|strong="G1218"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* when they \w knew|strong="G1921"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w was|strong="G2076"\w* a \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w*, \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w with|strong="G1096"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* about the \w space|strong="G5613"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w hours|strong="G5610"\w* cried \w out|strong="G2896"\w*, \w Great|strong="G3173"\w* \add is\add* \w Diana|strong="G0735"\w* of the \w Ephesians|strong="G2180"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when the \w townclerk|strong="G1122"\w* had \w appeased|strong="G2687"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w*, he \w said|strong="G5346"\w*, \add Ye\add* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* of \w Ephesus|strong="G2180"\w*, \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* is \w there|strong="G2076"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w knoweth|strong="G1097"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* how that the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* of the \w Ephesians|strong="G2180"\w* \w is|strong="G5607"\w* a \w worshipper|strong="G3511"\w* of the \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w goddess|strong="G2299"\w* \w Diana|strong="G0735"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w the|strong="G1356"\w* \add image\add* which fell down from \w Jupiter|strong="G1356"\w*?

\w Seeing|strong="G5607"\w* then \w that|strong="G3767"\w* these \w things|strong="G5130"\w* cannot be spoken \w against|strong="G0368"\w*, \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* to \w be|strong="G5225"\w* \w quiet|strong="G2687"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w do|strong="G4238"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w* \w rashly|strong="G4312"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* ye have brought \w hither|strong="G0071"\w* \w these|strong="G5128"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w*, which \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* robbers of \w churches|strong="G2417"\w*, nor \w yet|strong="G3777"\w* \w blasphemers|strong="G0987"\w* of \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w goddess|strong="G2299"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w Demetrius|strong="G1216"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w craftsmen|strong="G5079"\w* which \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w have|strong="G2192"\w* a \w matter|strong="G3056"\w* \w against|strong="G4314"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w*, the \w law|strong="G0060"\w* is \w open|strong="G0071"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w deputies|strong="G0446"\w*: let them \w implead|strong="G1458"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* ye \w enquire|strong="G1934"\w* any \w thing|strong="G5100"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* other \w matters|strong="G2087"\w*, it shall be \w determined|strong="G1956"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w lawful|strong="G1772"\w* \w assembly|strong="G1577"\w*.
